relation: Jason Bay advances to first on a dropped 3rd strike. Runner on first with none out and Nick Green due up.
Nick Green grounded into a double play, short to second to first. None on with two outs and Rocco Baldelli due up.
Rocco Baldelli flied out to left to end the inning.
pageTitle: Thursday, May 14, 2009 Boston Red Sox - Los Angeles Angels Box Scores, Game Results & Summary - USATODAY.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {41697=Jason Bulger (1-1) picked up the win by retiring two batters in the top of the 12th inning. Ervin Santana, in his 2009 debut, allowed seven hits and three runs over five innings., 42493=Ortiz is hitting .208 this season and has gone 144 at-bats since his last home run. That is one at-bat shy of tying his longest HR drought of his career, set September 9, 1998 - June 9, 2000, when he played with the Twins., 42227=Red Sox designated hitter David Ortiz continues to struggle at the plate. He went 0-for-7 with three strikeouts and tied a team record by leaving 12 men on base. Trot Nixon left 12 men on in a June 12, 2003 game against St. Louis that lasted 13 innings.}
